title: Episode #60: Wherein We Talk to DNI General Counsel Robert Litt
itunes:title: Episode #60: Wherein We Talk to DNI General Counsel Robert Litt
itunes:subtitle: DNI General Counsel Robert Litt talks about implementation of President Obama's NSA reforms, privacy rights for foreigners in espionage, spying on foreign heads of state, and amnesty for Edward Snowden.Help spread the word about the Lawfare Podcast:...
description:
DNI General Counsel Robert Litt talks about implementation of President Obama's NSA reforms, privacy rights for foreigners in espionage, spying on foreign heads of state, and amnesty for Edward Snowden.

Help spread the word about the Lawfare Podcast: Please rate and review it on whatever podcast distribution system you use. 

Support this show http://supporter.acast.com/lawfare.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
